post.body: lego is the toy that doesn't get boring. A video game provides only hours of fun. Legos are fun for years, always compatible.
so sorry to hear that. tough time to get tough news.
i'm confused. GateHouse is suing Globe because a page on Globe that links to Gatehouse is selling ad inventory?
Recently learned that Shalom comes from Shlaymut-completion. We can only be complete as a race, when there is cooperation, peace
firstly, thanks for speaking up as a rational thinker on an emotionally charged issue.
right, i got that off the site. It's asking people to step forward. Visiting the site, I'm not sure what or why.
getting on the list... did they do anything other than give $? How was it spent? Did they agree to be disclosed? Nice effort...
it's a life lesson about getting along with your neighbors. eating cookies in bed is a common corporate offense.
how did some people got in for 200, while others gave 50K. What does it mean to "be a member"? What were they supporting? PIC?
we're taking is down to blintzes, ice cream, sufganiyot and a kids movie. Sushi... sounds like a good surprise dessert!
are you kidding? we're swarming this place. happy chanukkah! anything special planned?
i'm not upset w them, it may be fair to say that twitter is overhyped. But not that it isn't innovative or is dumb.
could very well be, i have no idea. Would love to get behind the firewall with Blue 2.0 from IBM, it's supposed 2 be amazing
yeah, my 12 yr old sister is asking abt facebook. Very innocently, but it scares me.
do you ever think abt what life would be like if that good you friend you lost years ago was still here to share in your joy? cherish today.
Social Media lessons learned from Ernie and Bert - 1. be cool, 2. don't eat cookies in bed, 3. be confident, 4. nobody cares abt ur pigeons.
has anyone seen blot? my wife has never done chinese food or a movie on xmas, it's time to introduce some tradition to this day.
what's the best video service for sharing videos with ONLY a handful of people? YouTube's UI and UI is ridiculous for older relatives.
post: newsweek declares twitter dumbest innovation... http://tinyurl.com/9oj3bu - swing and a miss
newsweek should be ashamed of themselves. post coming shortly. Claim twitter is all hype, no substance. Wonder who generated the hype? ahem?
